job_title: Patient Registration Associate in Bangor, ME
pros: A "family feel" of coworkers, always something new to learn, your managers, supervisors, and coworkers support you trying to move to different positions through the company. They celebrate everything - baby showers, engagements, birthdays, retirements, changing positions etc. They know how to make each other feel noticed and good.
cons: Rules and precautions aren't always followed which is dangerous, being understaffed was a scary thing when it came to handling patients, and no one immediately there to handle the overflow. Unfortunately - with the tight-knit coworkers there was always active petty drama - especially from the older staff who you would assume would be mature, that really lowered morale through the department. Pay was not great and really hard to get a raise. We were once told to start a petition and see if that would work. (it did not) Being an empathetic person it can be a very tough role in the mental health field.
